data.Caption: When you're happy.. You enjoy the music.. When you're sad.. You understand the lyrics ..
Music is what feelings sound like
Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence.
One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
Good music. Good Friends. Good Vibes.
Music is my Life & Lyrics are my Stories.
I want to meet someone who makes me feel the way music does.
People are like Music; Some speak the truth and other are just Noise
|> Play the moments;|| pause the memories;[] stop the pain; |<< rewind to happiness
Music can change the world because it can change People
I'd rather listen to my music than to you.
If it's too loud, you're too old!
Listening to Music is the only good habit have that I have.
I'm turning you down and I'm turning up the music.
